title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.7 - Lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed plates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.7 - Lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed plates

State Regulations
(a) If one plate of a set of special number
plates is lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed, the holder thereof shall, upon
request, be issued a duplicate set of special number plates. (Standard series
plates shall be issued to the applicant for use until the duplicate set is
available.)
(b) If both plates of a
set of special number plates are lost, stolen, mutilated or destroyed, such
plates shall not be reissued until one year from their last stated expiration
date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
16.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
